synopsis.text:
Naru Tabidachi!): In this two-part special, airing during Pokemon Best Wishes!, we revisit beloved characters from the Diamond & Pearl series, Hikari and Takeshi, alongside their Pokemon. In the first episode, "Hikari - Setting off on a New Journey!", Hikari, having returned to her hometown of Twinleaf Town, is eager to embark on a new adventure in Hoenn. However, she faces a familiar dilemma - deciding which of her loyal Pokemon to take along. Encountering a novice trainer grappling with similar decisions, the pair finds themselves in an unexpected predicament when two Pokemon escape from Professor Rowan's lab.

Meanwhile, in Pewter City, Brock is diligently pursuing his dream of becoming a Pokemon doctor, leaving his brother Forrest in charge of their family gym. However, their peaceful routine is disrupted when a cryptic challenger arrives, threatening to shut down their gym forever! This crisis forms the crux of the second episode, "Nibi Gym - The Greatest Crisis Ever!". Join Hikari, Takeshi, and their Pokemon as they navigate these exciting challenges in this special feature.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
